item.description:
Been over a year since we have kayaked as a group.  Lets get to the water for kayaking / canoeing in Charles river.

We will meet at 9:30 am at the Newton Boat house, do the paper work for rentals and be on the water by 10.00. This is also a scenic stretch of flat water with lots of wildlife along the river, you may bring your camera, but keep it safe from water.

There is rental charge for the kayaks/canoes. We will plan to do about 2 hours, so if renting solo, it would be around $30.00pp, dual/shared ones would be 18.00pp.  Do bring your license/ID, bottle(s) of water, suntan lotion / hat. After the trip, we may stop at newton for sandwich/lunch.

There is a parking lot little further from the boathouse, it is little tricky to find out, you may stop at the boathouse to get directions or call me.

Rain cancels.﻿
item.how_to_find_us: Will email my contact info the day before
item.name: Canoe or Kayak at Charles River Canoe & Kayak in Newton
